recipe_name: Griddled yellow pepper with rocket and sesame salad and skordalia
author: Maria Elia
method: For the griddled pepper, drizzle the pepper quarters with olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat a griddle pan until smoking, add the peppers and griddle for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown and slightly charred. For the rocket salad, mix all of the salad ingredients together in a large bowl. For the skordalia, place the bread in a bowl with the water and leave to soak for a few minutes. Squeeze out the excess water, then place the softened bread into a food processor with the rest of the skordalia ingredients and blend to a smooth paste. To serve, spoon the skordalia onto two serving plates, top with the griddled pepper and serve the rocket salad on the sides.
ingredients: 1 yellow pepper, de-seeded, cut into quarters,  olive oil, for drizzling,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 large handful rocket leaves,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted,  squeeze lemon juice,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 slices white bread, crusts removed,  3 tbsp cold water,  1 clove garlic, chopped,  2-3 tbsp olive oil,  Â½ lemon, juice only,  2 tsp white wine vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
